Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus held his daughter and should have been playing with her, but he was distracted by what he watched on a data screen. There was a full scale Tripredacus assualt on the Predacon base occuring.

"This could be our chance to get Nightlight back," though Rodimus.
Rodimus opens a comm channel on all Maximal/Autobot channels.
 
Rodimus Prime(via comm): Maximals and allies, this is Commander Rodimus Prime. Currently the Tripredacus forces are attacking the Predacon base. I see this as an opportunity. I want all available units to converge on the Predacon base. We're taking them out!

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Elita:

elita woke up and meowed, she was full of energy and she liked play 
with her dad.
